message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe would be highly valuable to you.  Given its unique features and potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please feel free to share your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  I'm willing to negotiate, but $1,200,000 is below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,300,000?  This reflects its significance while still offering you a good deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll offer $1,250,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
